main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified object in Beekmantown, Montana, on 13 August 1964.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The object was described as resembling a burning haystack as it descended., The object appeared bright orange and larger than the moon., The observer noticed unusual movement, with the object going up and down and moving in a jerky fashion., The object did not reappear the following day when the observer looked for it.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling a burning haystack
